name: EKE-Electronics
goal: EKE provides tailored solutions for system integration, train automation, train communications and improved safety. EKE’s expertise ranges from developing complete Train Control and Management System (TCMS) or Train Communication Networks (TCN) to providing specific technology such as gateways or event recorders (JRU). EKE also offers advanced TCMS integrating Passenger Information Systems (PIS), video surveillance (CCTV) and wireless communication devices for a complete turn-key solution.
euInitiatives: Rail industry and transportation related initiatives in Europe and globally to support our business activities.
